snippet: Gov. Scott Walker signed a bill that would require women seeking abortions to undergo an ultrasound and would ban certain doctors from performing the procedures.
abstract: Wisconsin Gov Scott Walker quietly signs contentious bill that will require women seeking abortions to undergo ultrasound and will ban doctors who lack admitting privileges to nearby hospitals from performing the procedures.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Scott Walker signed a bill that would require women seeking abortions to undergo an ultrasound and would ban certain doctors from performing the procedures.
